title: Length and Distance Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of metric measurements and conversions

questions.question: How many centimeters are in 1 meter?
questions.explanation: 1 meter = 100 centimeters. This is a basic metric conversion.

questions.question: What unit would you use to measure the height of a person?
questions.explanation: A person is usually 1-2 meters tall. Meters is the appropriate unit. Centimeters would also be acceptable (like 150 cm).

questions.question: Convert 5 kilometers to meters.
questions.explanation: 1 kilometer = 1000 meters, so 5 km = 5 ร 1000 = 5000 meters.

questions.question: 2 meters and 200 centimeters are the same length.
questions.explanation: Yes! Since 1 meter = 100 centimeters, 2 meters = 200 centimeters.

questions.question: Convert 30 millimeters to centimeters.
questions.explanation: 10 millimeters = 1 centimeter, so 30 mm = 30 รท 10 = 3 cm.
